amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC. 419. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to implement, administer, or enforce the prevailing wage requirements in subchapter IV of chapter 31 of title 40, Unites States Code (commonly referred to as the Davis-Bacon Act).
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used to administer the wage-rate requirements of subchapter IV of chapter 31 of title 40, United States Code (Davis-Bacon Act).

vote.text: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A020) Failed by recorded vote: 192 - 231 (Roll no. 191).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A020) Failed by recorded vote: 192 - 231 (Roll no. 191).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A020) offered by Mr. King (IA).
